resources.string: PIN is used to validate that a request being sent to your phone originates from its owner. No request shall be processed without setting an initial PIN. Please enter a PIN number with minimum 4 digits.

Get your contacts in an Excel Spreadsheet. You can use this as a backup or an initial data source for synchronizing contacts into other non-google services. Once export is done, contacts.xls can be found on your sdcard root.
Save your SMS in an Excel Spreadsheet to preserve your message history. Once export is done, sms.xls can be found on your sdcard root.
Did you forget your phone at home? Don\'t fret, enable call forwarding remotely using this feature. Enter an accessible phone number(even hardline) and get your calls forwarded.
Lost your Phone? Locate your phone even if your phone\'s GPS or Data is OFF.
Remotely Initiate a call on your phone. You can give the target phone number as this phone\'s number to listen to the phone\'s surroundings.
Unable to find your phone?? Use this feature to Play your phone\'s ringtone at full volume, the tone is played even if the phone is in Silent mode.
